about_the_game:
Do you want to hook up the hottest moms? We got you covered, milf lovers! Enjoy the story with a bit of roleplay where you can name all characters!

The story follows a college student who's boring life comes to an end when his friend's mom thanks him for helping her son studying. Where will it all lead to? It's up to you!

The game features:

  • Fully animated, voiced sex scenes with hot milfs.
  • An option to name all characters in the game.
  • Gallery for replaying unlocked scenes for your convenience.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has Male x Female sexual content, adultery, and mentions of alcohol use. The game is intended only for adult auditory.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian 8 or higher (or similar platform)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian 8 or higher (or similar platform)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
